Francis Chouler bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa si Cape Town

Ọ zụrụ n'ime ihe nkiri na Mahadum nke Cape Town, gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta BA na Theatre na Performance na 2010. Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na ihe nkiri Bollywood, Crook N'afọ 2016, ọ mere ihe ngosi dika Jack Cleary na ihe nkiri Eye in the Sky yana ịpụta na usoro Netflix The Crown Francis bụ onye isi otu South African Guild of Actors
